cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.GT, cs.MA, cs.RO

Reasoning: The paper deals with decision-making problems, which are often studied in the fields of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the optimization of decision-making in the context of economics, which falls under the category of game theory (cs.GT). Additionally, the paper mentions robotics (cs.RO) as an application area for MDPs. Finally, the paper discusses algorithms for learning to play near-optimally, which suggests that it may also be relevant to the field of multi-agent systems (cs.MA).
